text: Answer: (c) Solution: 1+ machine resolves in Ex stage using predict-not taken 254 machine resolves in ID stage using one branch delay slot. Average CPI of 15 machine is CPI=1+02x025x2=1.1 Let x percentage of delay slot is filled by complier, then average CPI of 2+ machine is CPI=1+02x(1-yx1=12-02x So, in order to run equal or faster 1.1=12-0.2x x= 0.5 or 50% Correct answer is 50
